question.title: compile cordova project in android studio
question.body:
I am working in ionic to generate an app for android and ios, from the project I send the following command “ionic cordova build android”, to generate everything in the app, here I get an error but I generate the components and the necessary folder to call it in android studio, and at the time of reloading gradle project in android, I get the following error:

  • What went wrong: A problem occurred evaluating project ':app'.

Failed to apply plugin 'com.android.application'. Could not create an instance of type com.android.build.gradle.internal.dsl.BaseAppModuleExtension. > Could not create an instance of type com.android.build.gradle.internal.dsl.TestOptions. > Could not create an instance of type com.android.build.gradle.internal.dsl.TestOptions$UnitTestOptions. > 'void org.gradle.api.internal.DefaultDomainObjectSet.(java.lang.Class)'

I am working with java 8 and I have installed in my computer gradle 8.10.2, I attach screenshots of the error.

error
